original_text: They ask wooden idols to tell them what to do! A stick tells them what will happen in the future! They have turned away from me and they have lost their way. They have not been faithful to me, their God, as a prostitute is not faithful to her husband.
korean_text: 내 백성이 나무에게 묻고 그 막대기는 그들에게 고하나니 이는 그들이 음란한 마음에 미혹되어 하나님을 버리고 음행하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: They ask wooden idols to tell them what to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나무 우상에게 무엇을 해야 할지 말해달라고 요청합니다

sentences.original_text: A stick tells them what will happen in the future
sentences.korean_translation: 막대기가 그들에게 미래에 무슨 일이 일어날지 말해줍니다

sentences.original_text: They have turned away from me
and they have lost their way
They have not been faithful to me, their God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나, 그들의 하나님께 충실하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: as a prostitute is not faithful to her husband
